title: Peer Assessment Strategy Workshop for European Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic curriculum design and assessment methods
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training applying the European Higher Education Area (EHEA) peer assessment methodology to medical, legal, and technical professionals

learning_goals: Learners will provide specific and actionable feedback to peers during project execution.
Learners will analyze feedback to improve assignments and apply insights to self-reflection.
Learners will explain methods to enhance learning engagement and autonomy through peer assessment systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
